alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BLADEN AND ROBESON COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EST... At 245 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Wakulla, or 7 miles northeast of Laurinburg, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, St. Pauls, Rex, Hestertown, Shannon, Buie, Robeson Community College, Wakulla, Elrod, Smiths, Howellsville, Raemon, Tolarsville, Duart, Tobermory, Barker Ten Mile, and Purvis. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 8 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
